name: FlexInstrument
0:
”Alexa, open Flex instrument”
”Alexa, tell Flex instrument to start run”
”Alexa, tell Flex instrument to show run modules”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flex instrument
des:
This skill provides customers to interact with out genetic anlyzer instruments.
It includes generic utternces like volume increase, volume decrease, date, time etc.,
It includes basic commands like show consumable screen, library screens, etc.,
It also includes onversations like plate setup with detailed instructions.

Here are a few one-short utterances samples to enjoy the skill.
- If you want to view consumables screen, just say: "Alexa, ask flex instrument to show consumables"
- If you want to view library screen, just say: "Alexa, ask flex instrument to show library"
- If you want to view run modules screen, just say: "Alexa, ask flex instrument to open run modules"
- If you want to view dyeset screen, just say: "Alexa, ask flex instrument to go to dyesets"
